entry.title: Deploying machine learning models to AWS Lambda, with Connexion, Zappa and Docker
entry.summary: We are gonna learn how to easily deploy any Python3 application to AWS lambda without having to change any code or even go into the lambda console.

entry.title: Brainrex joins Libracamp, a boot camp to build on Facebook’s backed cryptocurrency project
entry.summary: After 4 weeks of voting, Brainrex has been selected as one of the 5 teams out of 160 that will be participating in Libracamp, a 2-month online boot camp to accelerate companies building on top of the Libra blockchain testnet.

entry.title: Brainrex competing for 150k USD at Battlefield San Francisco Blockchain Week
entry.summary: We are happy to announce we have been selected as one of the ten finalists at the Blockchain Battlefield...
